    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Main class for implementor. It runs implementor with arguments from command line.
      Parameters:
      args - arguments for implementor. It should be "(-jar) class output"

    • implement

      public void implement(Class<?> token, Path root) throws info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.implementor.ImplerException
      Description copied from interface: info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.implementor.Impler
      Produces code implementing class or interface specified by provided token.

      Generated class' name should be the same as the class name of the type token with Impl suffix added. Generated source code should be placed in the correct subdirectory of the specified root directory and have correct file name. For example, the implementation of the interface List should go to $root/java/util/ListImpl.java

      Specified by:
      implement in interface info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.implementor.Impler
      Parameters:
      token - type token to create implementation for.
      root - root directory.
      Throws:
      info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.implementor.ImplerException - when implementation cannot be generated.

    • createDirs

      private void createDirs(Path path)
      Creates parent directory for path.
      Parameters:
      path - file whose parent directory creates.

      private String packageLine(Class<?> token)

    • constructors

      private String constructors(Class<?> token) throws info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.implementor.ImplerException
      Generates constructors of token.
      Parameters:
      token - class which constructor should be generated or interface.
      Returns:
      String with generated constructors joined with System.lineSeparator. If token is interface this method returns empty string.
      Throws:
      info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.implementor.ImplerException - if class has no non-private constructors or security .

    • joinArgs

      private String joinArgs(Stream<String> stream, String prefix, String suffix)
      Generates string from elements of stream.
      Parameters:
      stream - stream which elements should be joined
      prefix - prefix for result string
      suffix - suffix for result string
      Returns:
      String from elements of stream with prefix in the start and suffix in the end.

      func - function that will be applied to each parameter.
      Returns:

    • writeImpl

      private void writeImpl(Class<?> token, BufferedWriter writer) throws info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.implementor.ImplerException, IOException
      Writes string with generated class with specified writer.

      It writes package information, declaration, constructors if token is class, methods of implemented class.

      Parameters:
      token - class for implementing.
      writer - writer that should write class to specified output file.
      Throws:
      info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.implementor.ImplerException - if token is a class and don't have non-private constructors or if SecurityException was thrown during the implementation.
      IOException - if writer has an error with writing to output.

    • checkArgs

      private void checkArgs(Class<?> token, Path path) throws info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.implementor.ImplerException
      Check if arguments of main method are correct.

      It checks if all arguments aren't equal null Also checks if it is possible to implement class or interface.

      Parameters:
      token - class for extending or interface for implementing.
      path - path where should be code of generated class.
      Throws:
      info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.implementor.ImplerException - if one of the args is null or token isn't implementable.

    • newDirectory

      private Path newDirectory(Path file) throws info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.implementor.ImplerException
      Creates temp parent directory for file.
      Parameters:
      file - file for which the directory will be generated.
      Returns:
      Path of new directory.
      Throws:
      info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.implementor.ImplerException - if it's impossible to create directory.

    • implementJar

      public void implementJar(Class<?> token, Path jarFile) throws info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.implementor.ImplerException
      Description copied from interface: info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.implementor.JarImpler
      Produces .jar file implementing class or interface specified by provided token.

      Generated class' name should be the same as the class name of the type token with Impl suffix added.

      Specified by:
      implementJar in interface info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.implementor.JarImpler
      Parameters:
      token - type token to create implementation for.
      jarFile - target .jar file.
      Throws:
      info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.implementor.ImplerException - when implementation cannot be generated.

    • compileClass

      private void compileClass(Class<?> token, Path path) throws info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.implementor.ImplerException
      Compile implemented class in specified path.
      Parameters:
      token - class or interface which should be implemented.
      path - path where class should be compiled.
      Throws:
      info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.implementor.ImplerException - if class can't be compiled.

    • createJar

      private void createJar(Class<?> token, Path path, Path jarFile) throws info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.implementor.ImplerException
      Writes .jar file from class implemented token to a specified path.
      Parameters:
      token - class or interface which should be implemented.
      path - path where contains class that will be compiled to jar.
      jarFile - path where to write file.
      Throws:
      info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.implementor.ImplerException - if IO error happens with writer.

    • getImplName

      private String getImplName(Class<?> file, String... type)
      Generate name for class which extends another or implements interface.
      Parameters:
      file - class for extending or interface for implementing.
      type - if it is empty, name will end with "Impl", otherwise with type[0]
      Returns:
      String name for class with or without type.
